. The influential Club for Growth has beefed up his political team, and traveled to both Iowa and New Hampshire. Mike Pence sent this message to supporters on his political e-mail list this afternoon: Friends and Supporters, Over the past few months, my family and I have been grateful for the encouragement we have received to consider other opportunities to serve our state and our nation in the years ahead. We have been especially humbled by the confidence and support of those who believe we should pursue the presidency, but after much deliberation and prayer, we believe our calling is closer to home.

Sergio Marchionne used the term "shyster loans" three times Friday in an address at an auto dealer's convention in San Francisco, but he issued a statement the next day expressing his regrets. I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern. I regret the remark which I consider inappropriate, Sergio Marchionne said in his statement. couple of missteps when I was a teenager- some 20 odd years ago," Brad, 38, tells OK! of his mistakes( including public intoxication, forgery and writing a bad check).
